LanguageData.RPP_Production_Component.label: make robotic component
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Component.description: Produce Robotic Components which are used as logic circuits within a Robotic Matrix.
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_I.label: make robotic matrix (Simple)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_I.description: Produce a robotic logical matrix for crafting a robot with Amateur-class skills (Tier 1).
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_II.label: make robotic matrix (Basic)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_II.description: Produce a robotic logical matrix for crafting a robot with Professional-class skills (Tier 2).
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_III.label: make robotic matrix (Intermediate)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_III.description: Produce a robotic logical matrix for crafting a robot with Master-class skills (Tier 3).
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_IV.label: make robotic matrix (Advanced)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_IV.description: Produce a robotic logical matrix for crafting a robot with System-Master-class skills (Tier 4).
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_V.label: make robotic matrix (Anti-Logic)
LanguageData.RPP_Production_Matrix_V.description: Produce an Anti-Logic Matrix for crafting a robot with Godlike skills (Tier 5).\nNP=P
